column2:
"Man, was I completely wrong! I thought
you could use photon arts just by
learning them."
"But I found out that you have to set them in the weapon palette before you can use them!"
"That was totally embarrassing. But whatever. Live and learn, right?"

"How about you? You're not just learning
skills without setting them, are you?"

"Hey, how about we take a look at your
weapon palette? All this talk has really
got me curious."
